title: Understanding Anxiolytics
text: Anxiolytics are medications that help reduce anxiety. They are different from other types of medications like antidepressants or antipsychotics.

title: Common Anxiolytics
text: Some common anxiolytics include benzodiazepines, which are often prescribed for short-term relief of anxiety symptoms.

title: Identifying Anxiolytics
text: Which of the following are considered anxiolytics?
choices: antipsychotics, antidepressants, mood stabilizers, anxiolytics, hypnotics, and stimulants
benzodiazepines, buspirone, and antidepressants, specifically SSRIs and SNRIs
